fullText: But after all the temporizing and flatulating earlier, the last-minute arrival of a point seemed, well, beside the point. Had I laughed more than twice in the playâ€™s previous 119 minutes, I might even have found it funny.

keyPhrases.quote: Had I laughed more than twice in the play's previous 119 minutes
after all the temporizing and flatulating earlier, the last-minute arrival of a point seemed, well, beside the point

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic explicitly states they only laughed twice in nearly two hours and dismisses the play's attempt at meaning as 'beside the point,' indicating a clear pan of what appears to be a comedy that failed to deliver laughs.
